quest: What do you prepare before you finish your goal?

options.q: a. I prefer to get detailed and diverse reference materials.
b. I like to follow simple and straightforward suggestions.
c. I usually do things with my own rules , but I have a core idea.

quest: How will you accomplish the goal process?

options.q: a. I like to break through and finish step by step.
b. I prefer to work hard to solve the problem completely.
c. I usually don’t arrange the steps in particular, just do it first.

quest: How do you usually make choices ?

options.q: a. Focus on the practical level, consider utility.
b. Focus on most people's experience and consult others suggest.
c. More attention to intuition, believe in my current feelings.

quest: Which information content is most appealing to you ?

options.q: a. A clear outline, a comparison chart, and a narrative of the regulations.
b. Clearly flow charts, causal maps, tables, and detailed instructions.
c. Paved stories, positive words, examples of resonance.

quest: Which narrative is the most convincing to you ?

options.q: a. 「They all recommend.」
b. 「I find it’s useful.」
c. 「You should give it a try.」

quest: How would you face the situations that others might not agree with ?

options.q: a. I hope to convince others and invite them to participate in the action.
b. As long as it is the right thing, I won’t care.
c. Avoid conflicts with others, but still do what I want to accomplish alone.

quest: Which one do you think will help you reach your goal?

options.q: a. Appropriate plan.
b. Working with partners.
c. Sense of accomplishment.

quest: Which is most appropriate for your ideal living environment ?

options.q: a. Surrounded by my favorite items.
b. Focus me on the most important things.
c. Maintain a refreshing space.

quest: If you can only choose one,which social platform would you choose to use ?

options.q: a. Facebook
b. Instagram
c. Youtube

quest: Which natural property is most like you ?

options.q: a. Fire, thunder, light.
b. Ice, gold, wood.
c. Wind, water, soil.

quest: Which adjective is most like your character ?

options.q: a.  kindness, honesty, confession, curiosity, sensitivity, warmth.
b.  seriousness, rigor, order, focus,  distance, reality, precision.
c.  balance, moderation, refreshment,  modesty,  patience, goodwill.

quest: Which mineral do you like the most?

options.q: a. Pure Gem.
b. Diamond.
c. Transparent crystal.

quest: Which picture makes you feel the happiest.

options.q: a. Some cups are neatly displayed in the cabinet.
b. a separate plain glass.
c. kinds of beautiful cups are placed on the table.

quest: Which paragraph do you like best? :

options.q: a.  while others could not have endured the distress, Hui did not allow his joy to be affected by it.
b.  I have still joy in the midst of these things.
c. Forever polishing it I will be,To never let it be dusted and vain.

quest: Which one is more suitable for your expectations of the future ?

options.q: a. I have a clear vision of the future and will be very specific.
b. I only pay attention to the present.
c. I believe that as long as you live diligently, your days will naturally become better.
